original_title: Curious Buddies: Let's Go to the Farm
overview: Designed for babies ages 3-18 months, in CURIOUS BUDDIES: LET’S GO TO THE FARM there’s so much for babies to see, hear, and feel at the farm! Take a hay ride, tend the animals, pick crops, milk the cows, discover different farm animals, examine sizes, textures, and colors, and dance, clap, play, learn, and laugh along with the Curious Buddies.
title: Curious Buddies: Let's Go to the Farm
